query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN date_of_birth DATE,
ADD COLUMN gender ENUM('male', 'female', 'other', 'prefer_not_to_say'),
ADD COLUMN blood_type VARCHAR(10),
ADD COLUMN height INT COMMENT 'in cm',
ADD COLUMN weight DECIMAL(5,2) COMMENT 'in kg',
ADD COLUMN chronic_conditions TEXT COMMENT 'JSON array',
ADD COLUMN allergies TEXT COMMENT 'JSON array',
ADD COLUMN current_medications TEXT COMMENT 'JSON array',
ADD COLUMN medical_history TEXT COMMENT 'JSON object',
ADD COLUMN emergency_contact VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN emergency_contact_name VARCHAR(255);
